Package gobblin.metrics.kafka

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KafkaAvroEventReporter
    EventReporter that emits events to Kafka as serialized Avro records.
    KafkaAvroEventReporter.Builder<T extends KafkaAvroEventReporter.Builder<T>>
    Builder for KafkaAvroEventReporter.
    KafkaAvroEventReporter.Factory  
    KafkaAvroReporter
    Kafka reporter for codahale metrics writing metrics in Avro format.
    KafkaAvroReporter.Builder<T extends KafkaAvroReporter.Builder<T>>
    Builder for KafkaAvroReporter.
    KafkaAvroReporter.BuilderFactory
    A static factory class for obtaining new KafkaAvroReporter.Builders
    KafkaAvroReporter.BuilderImpl  
    KafkaEventReporter
    Reports GobblinTrackingEvent to a Kafka topic serialized as JSON.
    KafkaEventReporter.Builder<T extends EventReporter.Builder<T>>
    Builder for KafkaEventReporter.
    KafkaEventReporter.BuilderImpl  
    KafkaEventReporter.Factory  
    KafkaPusher
    Establishes a connection to a Kafka cluster and pushed byte messages to a specified topic.
    KafkaReporter
    Kafka reporter for metrics.
    KafkaReporter.Builder<T extends MetricReportReporter.Builder<T>>
    Builder for KafkaReporter.
    KafkaReporter.BuilderFactory
    A static factory class for obtaining new KafkaReporter.Builders

    KafkaReporterFactory

    Closeable extension of producer
